doc:
Alf Goddard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alf_Goddard 0 Frank Henry "Alf" Goddard (28 November 1897 in Brentford, Middlesex – 25 February 1981 in Ealing, London) was an English film actor.Brother of a famous boxer, Alf Goddard was once a boxer too. He was also a trained athlete and a professional dancer. He served in the army in World War I and when he was invalided out he worked on munitions. He made his stage debut in a musical hall act in 1916. His first appearance in films was as a stunt double where he did a number of risky jobs like jumping off bridges and swimming in rough seas. This led to him being given acting parts. Later he moved on to comedy roles. Frank_Henry_"_Alf_"_Goddard ( 28_November_1897 in Brentford , Middlesex – 25_February_1981 in Ealing , London ) was an_English_film_actor.Brother of a_famous_boxer , Alf_Goddard was once a_boxer too . He was also a_trained_athlete and a_professional_dancer . He served in the_army in World_War_I and when he was_invalided out he worked on munitions . He made his_stage_debut in a_musical_hall_act in 1916 . His_first_appearance in films was as a_stunt double where he did a_number of risky_jobs like jumping off bridges_and_swimming in rough_seas . This led to him being_given_acting parts . Later he moved on to comedy_roles .
